home.title: Browser-first utilities for developers and creators
home.subtitle: Fast, privacy-friendly tools that run in your browser. No uploads required.
home.localOnly: All processing happens locally in your browser.

base64.name: Base64 Converter
base64.description: Encode and decode text locally in your browser.

word-counter.name: Word Counter
word-counter.description: Count words, characters, and lines instantly.

case-converter.name: Case Converter
case-converter.description: Convert text between upper, lower, camelCase, and snake_case.

diff-checker.name: Diff Checker
diff-checker.description: Compare two texts and highlight differences.

lorem-ipsum.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
lorem-ipsum.description: Generate placeholder text on the fly.

markdown-preview.name: Markdown Preview
markdown-preview.description: Preview Markdown with GitHub-flavored markdown support.

password-generator.name: Password Generator
password-generator.description: Generate strong local passwords with custom length and symbols.

hash-generator.name: Hash Generator
hash-generator.description: Compute MD5, SHA-256, and SHA-512 locally in your browser.

qr-generator.name: QR Code Generator
qr-generator.description: Create QR codes locally from text or URLs.

exif-viewer.name: EXIF Viewer
exif-viewer.description: Inspect photo metadata (camera, time) in your browser.

color-converter.name: Color Converter
color-converter.description: Convert between HEX and RGB on the fly.

toolShell.error: Something went wrong. Please check your input.

wordCounter.placeholder: Paste or type text to count...

exifViewer.instruction: Upload a photo to inspect its metadata.
